page.title: 05 THE VILLAGE
page.content: {Ramsden Heath}is a typical English village,small and quiet,with}many items of interest to both visitor and resident alike. There are{four shops}and{two pubs}in the centre of the village.They are a food shop/post office,butcher's, laundrette and a hairdressing salon. There is a{garage}not far from these shops called Brewsters.It has four petrol pumps. On the other side of the square is{The White Horse,}a delightful public house and restaurant.In the centre is a memorial to soldiers killed in the first world war.Just down the road is a second 'pub'{The Nag's head.}In the other direction is the{village school,}quite an important place. The{park}nearby is well used by nearly everyone.It has swings,climbing frames and a slide.
